title: Sandy Springs searches for new finance director - Reporter Newspapers
content: Sandy Springs searches for new finance director  Reporter Newspapers
description: Sandy Springs is searching for a new finance director after Toni Jo Howard resigned from the position effective March 25. Toni Carlisle has been serving as interim finance director and will do so until a permanent replacement has been selected, city spokesperson Jason Fornicola said. No reason was given for Howard’s resignation. Carlisle served in […]
